answers.answer: If you are scheduled for an ultrasound it is possible. But most docs don't try to tell gender until 16-20 weeks and at my docs office they won't do an ultrasound unless you schedule it.

Nope. It will not be that accurate. Just wait til your 20 week scan! I know you wanna know but it's better them telling you what the sex of your baby 100% than just guessing and tell you it's a boy! && turns out to be the opposite

I'm in va n they don't do it tht way. I was 9 wks whn I went to my first appointment n it was no ultrasound at all. N this next wld be considered first trimester ultrasound even tho Ill be at the beginning of my sec. Some ppl have found out betwn 14-16 wks with visible parts
But that early it's hard to tell. I was told that early but only because my son had already started,developing, my doctor said 9 times out of ten boys still look like girls til between 16-18 weeks
I'm in va I'm currently 24 weeks and I found out I was having a girl at 14 weeks & 4 days
Ok so it is possible whn I have my ultrasound ill be 14 wks n 3 days. Was it because of how ur baby was positioned
The gender hasn't changed since thn right?
Baby's position has a lot to do with it too! I found out at 15 weeks and 5 days that it was a girl,  so they could possibly tell ya!
I went for gestational diabetes test at 13 wks and they told me the sex of the baby
the ultrasound tech was just able to see it really good and yes its still a girl :)

question: My next appointment ill be 14 wks is it a possibility they cn determine the sex at tht many wks. I'm hoping they can because at my hospital tht dnt do gender scans if they can tell they'll jst tell u n I want to make sure my fiance will witness tht n be able to request off work
title: next appointment
